content: this is a summary of a civil case that took place in the vilnius regional district court the court ordered the defendant to pay court fees of €1606 and the applicant to pay legal fees of €5000 in the final resolution of a matrimonial property case the court awarded the applicant various properties including a plot of land a dwelling house a garage a barn a cowshed and a vehicle the court also ordered the applicant to pay compensation of 125627 and the defendant to pay compensation of 599200 for the awarded real estate and vehicle the court declared both parties jointly and severally liable for the debts of a credit agreement the legal text discusses the division of property in the case referring to specific articles of the civil code the court initially made a decision in the case but later annulled part of it and remitted the case back to the lower court for a fresh hearing the applicant submitted additional claims to amend the division of property and the court determined that the property should be divided equally between the parties the court also addressed the joint financial commitments and liabilities of the parties the court rejected the defendants claim for the applicant to be held liable for a loan from a third party the court noted that property located in russia falls under the jurisdiction of russian courts according to the civil procedure code the court ordered the party who won the judgment to pay the costs of the proceedings and the applicants representative has submitted an application for payment of costs the court awarded the applicant a certain amount of money for the costs the defendant may be ordered to pay the applicants costs if the revised application is upheld the court also made a decision regarding the division of matrimonial property and declared both parties jointly and severally liable for a debt to a bank the applicant has been ordered to pay the defendants costs and the defendant has been ordered to pay the costs of the state
